data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Aegis Vopak Terminals Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from June 02 2025 the equity shares of Aegis Vopak Terminals Ltd (Scrip Code: 544407) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250530- dated May 30 2025.
